title: Ticket #6543: Test multiple SUM metrics.
description:
The current regression test, cmr-monitor-basic, tests quite a bit, but only for a single SUM metric. It, or another test, should also test multiple SUM metrics, to verify that we don't get confused. This should cover:

  • one SUM metric for multiple resource types
  • more than one SUM metric for one resource type
  • more than one SUM metric for multiple resource types

These tests would be conducted with multiple resource instances, but only one instance per slot.

  • The fourth subtest should repeat the third, but with multiple resource instances per slot.
remarks:
2018-Feb-19 15:05:04 by tlmiller:
These tests should also handle static and dynamic slots, as well as slot reuse.

2018-Mar-14 16:32:34 by tlmiller:
See #6605, instead.
creator: tlmiller
